info.title: Order and Delivery Schedules
info.description: You use the Order and Delivery Schedules service to retrieve data that is used, maintained, and generated in the process of scheduling orders and deliveries, for example, order and delivery schedules, scheduling groups, and scheduling group assignments. Consuming applications can retrieve the data as well as information on whether scheduling groups or associated product assignments were marked for deletion.

x-sap-shortText: Retrieve data that is used, maintained, and generated in the process of scheduling orders and deliveries.

externalDocs.description: Documentation for SAP Order and Delivery Scheduling

get.summary: Retrieve a list of order and delivery schedules.
get.description: When you carry out the request, you get a list of generated order and delivery schedules. You can also narrow down the result by setting the respective parameters. To get additional information about the order and delivery schedules, use the $expand parameter.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionfilter)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionorderby)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expand related entities, see [Expand](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionexpand)

200.description: List of order and delivery schedules retrieved successfully.

403.description: You do not have the required authorization to carry out this request.

parameters.description: Order and delivery schedule ID
parameters.name: id

get.summary: Retrieve a single order and delivery schedule.
get.description: To carry out this request, you must specify the respective order and delivery schedule ID. To get additional information about the order and delivery schedule, use the $expand parameter.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expand related entities, see [Expand](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionexpand)

200.description: Order and delivery schedule retrieved successfully.

403.description: You do not have the required authorization to carry out this request.

404.description: There are no order delivery schedules for the specified IDs.

parameters.description: Order and delivery schedule ID
parameters.name: id

get.summary: Retrieve the supplier of an order and delivery schedule.
get.description: You can use this request to retrieve the supplier (external source) of a specific order and delivery schedule. To carry out the request, you must specify the respective order and delivery schedule ID.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

200.description: Supplier of order and delivery schedule retrieved successfully.

403.description: You do not have the required authorization to carry out this request.

404.description: There are no order delivery schedules for the specified IDs.

parameters.description: Order and delivery schedule ID
parameters.name: id

get.summary: Retrieve the internal source of an order and delivery schedule.
get.description: You can use this request to retrieve the internal source of a specific order and delivery schedule. An internal source can be either a supplying distribution center, or a supplying store. To carry out the request, you must specify the respective order and delivery schedule ID.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

200.description: Internal source of order and delivery schedule retrieved successfully.

403.description: You do not have the required authorization to carry out this request.

404.description: There are no order delivery schedules for the specified IDs.

parameters.description: Order and delivery schedule ID
parameters.name: id

get.summary: Retrieve a list of scheduling group assignments.
get.description: When you carry out this request, you get a list of all generated scheduling group assignments, that is, the information about which products and sources are assigned to which scheduling groups. To get additional information about the scheduling group assignments, use the $expand parameter.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionfilter)

parameters.name: id

get.summary: Retrieve a single scheduling group assignment.
get.description: To carry out this request, you must specify the respective scheduling group assignment ID. The result will be the information about which product and which source are assigned to the involved scheduling group. To get additional information about the scheduling group assignment, use the $expand parameter.

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

404.description: There are no scheduling group assignments for the specified IDs.

parameters.name: id

OrderDeliverySchedulesService_auth.description: To use this API, you need to obtain the OAuth client credentials (client ID and secret) using the SAP BTP cockpit.

scopes.{xsappname}.SupplierDpp: Supplier Data for Data Protection and Privacy

ReadOdsService.OrderDeliverySchedules.title: OrderDeliverySchedules
ReadOdsService.OrderDeliverySchedules.description: Order and delivery schedules contain information about possible order and delivery dates and times for scheduling groups in relation to specific sources and recipients.

id.description: The technical ID (UUID) of the order and delivery schedule.

supplier.description: The external source that delivers a scheduling group to a recipient. Either this field or the field supplyingPlant must be filled.

supplyingPlant.description: The internal source, that is, a distribution center, that delivers a scheduling group to a recipient. Either this field or the field supplier must be filled.

schedulingGroup.description: A scheduling group is a group of products that can be handled together in the order and delivery process.

recipient.description: The distribution center or the store to which a scheduling group is delivered by a source.

validityStartDate.description: The local validity start date of the order and delivery schedule header.

validityEndDate.description: The local validity end date of the order and delivery schedule header.

isMarkedForDeletion.description: Specifies whether the order and delivery schedule header is marked for deletion.

createdAt.description: The point in time when the order and delivery schedule was created.

modifiedAt.description: The point in time when the order and delivery schedule was last modified.

orderDeliveryScheduleType.description: The schedule type of an order and delivery schedule.

ReadOdsService.OrderDeliveryScheduleItem.title: OrderDeliveryScheduleItems
ReadOdsService.OrderDeliveryScheduleItem.description: The order and delivery schedule items that are assigned to an order and delivery schedule header. The items contain possible delivery dates and times for the supply network node specified in the header.

id.description: The technical ID (UUID) of the order and delivery schedule item.

deliveryDate.description: The local date of the recipient on which goods are delivered.

deliveryTimeRangeStart.description: The start time (local time of the recipient) of the timeframe within which goods are delivered.

deliveryTimeRangeEnd.description: The end time (local time of the recipient) of the timeframe within which goods are delivered.

orderDate.description: The local date of the recipient before which goods must be ordered so that they can be delivered on time.

orderTime.description: The time (local time of the recipient) before which goods must be ordered so that they can be delivered on time.

availabilityDate.description: The local date as of which goods are available for further processing at the recipient.

availabilityTime.description: The time (local time of the recipient) as of which goods are available for further processing at the recipient.

stagingDate.description: The local date on which goods must be available for picking at the source.

stagingTime.description: The time (local time of the recipient) at which goods must be available for picking at the source.

ReadOdsService.SchedulingGroupAssignment.title: SchedulingGroupAssignments
ReadOdsService.SchedulingGroupAssignment.description: A scheduling group assignment represents an assignment of a product and an optional source to a scheduling group.

id.description: The technical ID (UUID) of the scheduling group assignment

schedulingGroup.description: A scheduling group is a group of products that can be handled together in the order and delivery process.

product.description: The product that is assigned to the scheduling group.

supplier.description: Represents the external source of goods. Depending on the configuration of the scheduling group, the field can either be filled or empty. To find the scheduling group, a two-step approach must be performed. In a first read, it is required to search for a scheduling group using product and supplier as filter criteria. If no scheduling group was found in the first read, it is required to search for it in a second read, using only product as filter criterion. Either this field or the field supplyingPlant can be filled.

supplyingPlant.description: Represents the internal source of goods (a plant of type distribution center). Depending on the configuration of the scheduling group, the field can either be filled or empty. To find the scheduling group, a two-step approach must be performed. In a first read, it is required to search for a scheduling group using product and plant as filter criteria. If no scheduling group was found in the first read, it is required to search for it in a second read, using only product as filter criterion. Either this field or the field supplier can be filled.

isMarkedForDeletion.description: Determines whether a scheduling group assignment is marked for deletion.

createdAt.description: The point in time when the scheduling group assignment was created.

modifiedAt.description: The point in time when the scheduling group assignment was last modified.

ReadOdsService.SchedulingGroups.title: SchedulingGroups
ReadOdsService.SchedulingGroups.description: A scheduling group is a group of products that can be handled together in the order and delivery process.

id.description: The technical ID (UUID) of the scheduling

displayId.description: The ID that is displayed on the user interface.

name.description: The name of the scheduling group.

schedulingGroupType.description: Determines whether a scheduling group is delivered by a supplier (external) or by a distribution center (internal).

schedulingGroupStatus.description: Determines whether a scheduling group is active or inactive.

isMarkedForDeletion.description: Determines whether a scheduling group is marked for deletion.

count.description: The number of entities in the collection. Available when using the [$count](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptioncount) query option.

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptiontop)

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: Skip the first n items, see [Paging - Skip](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionskip)

search.name: $search
search.description: Search items by search phrases, see [Searching](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionsearch)
